name: Counter Bank
author: Alucard648
description: Stand on FFC and press either EX1 to deposit counter, or EX2 to withdraw previously deposited. Bank safe has limited capacity and triggers reward, if filled.
setup: Place FFC at trigger position. D0 - Screen D to keep track of balance on bank account. D1 - Counter to be used by this bank. For blood donations, minimum of 1 full heart should left upon deposit. D2 - Max counter amount transferred per button press. D3 - String to display when bank account is either empty of full. Insert user manual here. D4 - Bank account limit. If filled, reward triggers. D5 - Reward. >0 - Award item ID, -1 - Secret trigger. D6 - Combo position to render bank account balance. D7 - Combo used to render counter image.
